hero.title: About Chan'ce Solution
hero.subtitle: We are a passionate web development company dedicated to transforming businesses through innovative digital solutions. Our mission is to create powerful, user-friendly applications that drive growth and success for small businesses.

mission.description: To empower small businesses with cutting-edge web technologies and exceptional user experiences.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the leading web development partner for businesses seeking digital transformation and growth.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We stay ahead of technology trends to deliver cutting-edge solutions that give our clients a competitive edge.

partnership.title: Partnership
partnership.description: We work closely with our clients, treating their success as our own and building long-term relationships.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We maintain the highest standards in code quality, performance, and user experience.

growth.title: Growth
growth.description: We help businesses scale and grow through scalable, maintainable web solutions.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: We offer comprehensive web development services tailored to meet the unique needs of small businesses and startups.

mobileFirst.description: Mobile-optimized solutions that work seamlessly across all platforms.

maintenance.title: Maintenance & Support
maintenance.description: Ongoing support and maintenance to keep your applications running smoothly.

techStack.evolving: Always learning and adopting new technologies to stay ahead of the curve

videoDownload.title: YouTube Video Downloader
videoDownload.urlLabel: YouTube URL (Required for "Download Video", optional for "Download Trending")
videoDownload.durationLabel: Duration (seconds) - Leave empty for entire video

validation.noUrl: Please enter a YouTube URL to download a specific video.
validation.invalidUrl: Please enter a valid YouTube URL (e.g., https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=...)
validation.invalidDuration: Duration must be a positive number.

instructions.title: How it works:
instructions.downloadVideo: Download Video: Requires a YouTube URL to download a specific video
instructions.downloadTrending: Download Trending: Downloads the most viewed trending video of the day (no URL needed)
instructions.duration: Duration: Leave empty to download entire video, or specify seconds for a segment
instructions.format: Videos are saved in MP4 format with best quality up to 1080p
instructions.download: Click the download button to save the video to your device
instructions.cleanup: Use "Cleanup Files" to remove old video files from the server
